title: Great place / Reasonable price
text: There are quite a few hotels in San Francisco - and hotels with parking area is a plus!! The hotel has 2 location and I went to the one in Lombard St. - The location is perfect and if you wish and like walking - it is walking distance to Fisherman's Wharf (that in itself saved me money for parking area) specially that part of the tourist attraction - Close to the beach. :)The outside is not much and deceiving - Rooms are clean, and big. The front desk is efficient, friendly and transactions for check in and out - was fast. The room has all the ammenities like mini microwace, fridge and cable - there is remote control - stored in front desk for they said that the remote usually gets stolen... There is even ironing board and an iron inside my room. Like that "unhappy" person mentioned about the shower - their shower works - like me I just did not know how to turn it on.I ENJOYED MY STAY AND WOULD RECOMMEND PLACE -
